decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the internal water usage rate of 105l/p/day would be achieved.(Sufficient evidence has been submitted with regards to the 19% reduction compared to 2013 Part L Building Regulations)The application should resubmit with more evidence regarding internal water usage.
description: Details required for Condition 6 (Sustainability) of planning permission 16/14626/FUL (Demolition of Existing sheds and erection of a new detached house in garden land with detached garage)
